job.description: ltstronggtThis AI Computer Software company located in Palo Alto CA is looking to hire a sharp Data Science Engineer to join their growing companyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThis Jobot Job is hosted by Taylor BuckelewltbrgtltbrgtAre you a fit Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button and sending us your resumeltbrgtltbrgtSalary 135000  170000 per yearltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtA Bit About UsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtLocated in the beautiful Palo Alto CA we are the leading provider of AI powered software products that transform healthcare claims and payment operations Our platform has enabled us to develop and deploy at high speed industryspecific productsltbrgtltbrgtWe are looking to hire a strong Data Scientist that will come in develop and deploy scalable machine learning solutions to solve problems in the healthcare spaceltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhy join usltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtWe offer a comprehensive compensation package including but not limited toltbrgtltulgtltligt A competitive base salary ranging from 135K165K DOE  EQUITY ltligtltligt401kltligtltligtBenefits Health Dental VisionltligtltligtCollaborative teamltligtltligtTrainingsltligtltligtPaid time offltligtltligtParties and team building eventsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtJob DetailsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtYou will be responsible for and MUST have most or ALL of the followingltbrgtltulgtltligtBachelors of Masters in Computer Science or related fieldltligtltligtStrong business analysis skillsltligtltligtExperience in solving realworld business problems involving datadriven optimizationltligtltligtExperience with developing and deploying machinelearning systemsltligtltligtStrong experience with a programming language  Python SQL R etcltligtltligtExperience building data pipelinesltbrgtltligtltulgtIF INTERESTED APPLY DIRECTLY HERE OR EMAIL ME A RESUME AT taylorbuckelewjobotcomltbrgtltbrgtInterested in hearing more Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply buttonltbrgtltbrgt
